title: SDTPS (Sharjah Government - Directorate Of Town Planning & Survey)
description: Comprehensive application for the Sharjah Government covering diverse city planning and surveying services.

details.description: The SDTPS application for Sharjah Government covers a wide range of services and information related to city planning and surveying. It provides users with convenient access to various modules and services offered by the Directorate Of Town Planning & Survey.
features: Feedback (Chairman hotline, Suggestions, Survey, and Poll)
Land guide and My Land Info
frameworks: iOS: AFNetworking, Core Data, Core Location, Maps, Camera
Android: Caldroid, Ion Networking, KSOAP2, Butterknife, AChart, Picasso, ZXing, Social Media Integration

Used Caldroid, Ion Networking, and KSOAP2 for Android development.
Developed features such as map integration, camera functionality, and social media integration.
Worked on tablet design and migration of the application.
Ensured compatibility across different versions of iOS and Android.

This project was a significant milestone in my career, allowing me to contribute to a major public service initiative and enhance the accessibility of city planning and surveying services in Sharjah.
